sched_compat.h

00001 #ifndef SCHED_COMPAT_H
00002 #define SCHED_COMPAT_H
00003 
00004 /*
00005  * Provide missing prototypes to old Glibc.
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include <sched.h>
00009 
00010 #if __GLIBC__ < 2 || __GLIBC__ == 2 && __GLIBC_MINOR__ < 3
00011 
00012 #include <errno.h>
00013 #include <asm/unistd.h>
00014 /* FIXME: for ia64, we need to provide a definition of _syscall3. */
00015 #ifndef __NR_sched_setaffinity
00016 #define __NR_sched_setaffinity  241
00017 #endif /* defined(__NR_sched_setaffinity) */
00018 
00019 typedef struct {
00020     unsigned long __bits [1024 / (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8)];
00021 } cpu_set_t;
00022 
00023 #define CPU_ZERO(cpusetp)                                               \
00024     do {                                                                \
00025         unsigned __i;                                                   \
00026         cpu_set_t *arr = (cpusetp);                                     \
00027             for(__i = 0;                                                \
00028                 __i < sizeof(cpu_set_t) / sizeof(unsigned long);        \
00029                 __i++)                                                  \
00030                arr->__bits[__i]=0;                                      \
00031     } while (0)
00032 
00033 # define __CPUELT(cpu)  ((cpu) / (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8))
00034 # define __CPUMASK(cpu) \
00035     ((unsigned long) 1 << ((cpu) % (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8)))
00036 
00037 #define CPU_SET(cpu, cpusetp) \
00038     ((cpusetp)->__bits[__CPUELT (cpu)] |= __CPUMASK (cpu))
00039 
00040 
00041 static inline _syscall3(int,
00042                         sched_setaffinity,
00043                         pid_t, pid,
00044                         unsigned int, len,
00045                         const cpu_set_t *, mask);
00046 
00047 #define sched_setaffinity(pid, mask) \
00048     sched_setaffinity(pid, sizeof(cpu_set_t), mask)
00049 
00050 #endif /* Glibc version < 2.3 */
00051 
00052 #endif /* SCHED_COMPAT_H */
